\begin{matlabcode}
syms phi lambda theta dtheta dphi real
assumeAlso (-1*pi < phi <= pi)
assumeAlso (-1*pi < lambda <= pi)
assumeAlso (-1*pi < theta <= pi)
assumeAlso (-1*pi < dtheta <= pi)
assumeAlso (-1*pi < dphi <= pi)
syms n
assumeAlso (n, 'integer')
simplify(((cos(dtheta/2 + pi/4))^2 + cos(dphi - theta)*(sin(dtheta/2 + pi/4))^2)^2 + (sin(dphi-theta)*(sin(dtheta/2 +pi/4) )^2)^2 - (cos(theta/2))^2)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
ans = 
    $\displaystyle {{\left({\cos \left(\frac{\textrm{dtheta}}{2}+\frac{\pi }{4}\right)}^2 +\cos \left(\textrm{dphi}-\theta \right)\,{\sin \left(\frac{\textrm{dtheta}}{2}+\frac{\pi }{4}\right)}^2 \right)}}^2 +{\sin \left(\textrm{dphi}-\theta \right)}^2 \,{\sin \left(\frac{\textrm{dtheta}}{2}+\frac{\pi }{4}\right)}^4 -{\cos \left(\frac{\theta }{2}\right)}^2 $
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
